TopicTitle: Purple Stage Light On/ Can't Start Rocket With Space

Articles.Content: The purple stage light is stuck on the bottom of my screen, I've tried restarting and switching games but that hasn't worked. Everything else I've seen posted suggests doing alt-L but that doesn't work for me. I really don't know why it's doing this and I haven't found anything else. Thank for the help in advance!

11 hours ago, Snako731 said:

The purple stage light is stuck on the bottom of my screen, I've tried restarting and switching games but that hasn't worked. Everything else I've seen posted suggests doing alt-L but that doesn't work for me. I really don't know why it's doing this and I haven't found anything else. Thank for the help in advance!

Press insert.

This just happened to me, I managed to fix it. I suspect its a bug on the launch pad (playing in sandbox). I just clicked on the numbers next to the purple light and it just started working. Don't know if that's any help but it didn't go away after a game restart, that's the only thing that sorted it. 

Taz V-L
